DateTimePicker

RadDateTimePicker allows interactive selection of dates using a drop down calendar. Features of RadDateTimePicker include:

  • Internationalization support.

  • Support forÂ theming via pre-defined themes that ship with the product or use the Visual Style Builder to alter or create your own themes.

  • Supports multiple built-in date formats or custom formats.
